name: Petzl Club Canyoneering Semi Static 10mm Rope
description: A burly rope to handle caving and slot canyon trips. The EverFlex treatment keeps the rope handling great and the 10mm thickness adds durability and friction on rappels. This non-dynamic rope is great for rappelling or hauling.EverFlex thermal treatment stabilizes the core strands and provides consist handling.Length includes 10% margin to compensate for rope shrinkage over time.Static strength (unknotted) is 28kN. Static strength when knotted is 16kN.Sheath percentage is 41%.Meets static cord certification for CE and UIAA.Suitable for hauling and rappelling.
